onSummonReceived: From the trembling earth, {forename} rises to join the fray!
{referenceName} emerges from the shadows, ready to fight!
'I heed your call!', declares {forename} as they enter the battle.
onResurrect: {referenceName} gasps and returns to the fight!
{forename} shakes off death and stands once more!

onKill: {forename} stands over the fallen foe: "As expected."

onCrit: {forename} winces: "I'm sorry it had to be this way."

onFall: {forename} accepts their fate with quiet dignity.

onMissReceived: {forename} grins: "You'll have to do better than that!"

onEngage: {referenceName} shouts: "I, {forename}, will protect the sacred grounds!"
{forename} nervously whines: "Please, don't harm me! It's my first day!"
onFall: {forename} falls silent, their eyes glazing over.
onFlee: {referenceName} cries: "I must live to fight another day!"

onEngage: {referenceName} prays: "By the dark lord, you shall not pass!"
{referenceName} warns: "Leave this unhallowed place at once!"
{referenceName} cries: "You dare to enter this unholy place?!"
{referenceName} chants: "Dark powers, arise and smite these intruders!"
onCrit: {referenceName} snarls: "Feel the wrath of the dark gods!"
{forename} growls: "Your flesh will feed the shadows!"
onHitReceived: {forename} snarls: "The dark gods will avenge me!"
onFall: {referenceName} gasps: "No... the dark gods... have forsaken me..."

onEngage: {referenceName} is startled: "Who goes there? Stay away from my graves!"
onFall: {referenceName} groans: "The earth claims me at last..."
{forename} falls silent, their eyes glazing over.

onEngage: {referenceName} hisses: "This tomb's treasures will be mine!"
{forename} snarls: "Step aside, or taste my blade!"
{referenceName} intones: "You shall join my immortal legion!"
{forename} declares: "Your flesh will nourish my dark arts!"
onSummon: {referenceName} chants: "From the depths, I call you forth!"
{forename} waves their hands about, summoning undead servants!
onKill: {forename} murmurs: "Your death serves a greater purpose."
{referenceName} whispers darkly: "So your life ends, but have no fear. Death is but a doorway."
{forename} says coldly: "Your soul will fuel my power."
onMissReceived: {forename} hisses: "I will not be thwarted so easily!"
